data.text: Yesu kalawa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, na hayang'ali yakuka, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlanguse matsengo ghe ing'anda ye Imulungu,
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Angu mwoghona agha ghose? Nowalongelani ghendo, kuduhu libwe ilitsolekighwa mchanya mwa liyaghe, chila libwe litsokwasighwa hasi.”

Yesu hayang'ali kakala mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela waliyeka wamghutsa, “Utulongele, agha ghose ghatsolawila tsuwachi? Na chihi chitsakuwa chitango cha ukutsa kwako na ukumala kwe iisi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwalangitse, imunu yaleke kuwaghutsukila.
Kwaapfila iwanu wengi watsakutsa kwa taghwa lyangu na ukulonga wawo iwo Kiristu Imkombotsi, na watsowaghutsukila iwanu wengi.
Mtsohulika tsing'ondo na mbuli tsake, lekeni mleke kupfuka. Agho ghose ghobamighwa ghalawile, lekeni ukumala kwe iisi ng'ana kupfike bae.
Isi ingi itsetowa na isi ingi, undewa ungi witsetowa na undewa ungi. Kutsolawila inzala ng'ulu na mdedemo we isi chila hanu.
Agha ghose ka mwanduso wa usungu wa ukweleka imwana.
“Kuya mtsoghoghighwa na kudunuzighwa na kukomighwa. Na isi tsose tsitsowahila kwaajili ya nene.
Ghamatsuwa agho iwanu wengi watsoleka ukutoghola kwawo, na watsehunduka na wetsehila,
na manabii wengi wa ughutsu watsolawila na kuwaghutsukila iwanu wengi.
Kwaajili ye ukongetseka ghehile, unoghelo we iwanu utsohunguka,
lekeni ayula iyodudumila mbaka utsighilo katsokombolighwa.
Na Imbuli ino Inoghile ya undewa itsopetighwa mne isi yose ka ukalangama kwe isi tsose, kuya ukumala kwe iisi kutsakutsa.
“Mtsakona, ‘lideso lya ukuhinya’ lyalongile nabii Danyeli, litsakwima hanu haenzeluke, ayula iyosoma amanye.
Kuya iwanu iwali mne isi ya Yudeya watsumile mpfidunda.
Na iyali mchiswili mwe ing'anda yake, aleke kuhulumka kusola chinu chochose.
Yali kumghunda aleke kuya kusola lighwanda lyake.
Watsoghaya iwapinga wane tsiinda na awala iwakong'etsa mne ghamatsuwa agho.
Mlombe ili kutsuma kwenu kuleke kuwa mne msimu wa chipfeghetsi au mne litsuwa lya Sabato.
Kwaapfila kutsolawila maghayo ng'ana ghalawile bae kulawa isi hailumbighwe mbaka leloli, na ng'aghatsolawila keli bae.
Ka ghamatsuwa agho ng'aghahungusighwe bae kuduhu imunu yang'akomboke. Lekeni kwaajili ye iwanu wala iwasaghulighwe, ghamatsuwa agho ghatsohungutsighwa.
Imunu ang'awalongela, ‘Ulole, Kiristu Imkombotsi kahano!’ au ‘Kahala!’ mleke kutoghola.
Kwaapfila tsina Kiristu wa ughutsu na manabii wa ughutsu watsolawila na kutenda pfitango pfingi na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ili kuwaghutsukila iwanu, ka yodahika hata awala iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu.
Muhulikitse! Nongola kuwalongelani imbuli ino ng'ana chipindi chipfike.
“Apfo, Imunu wowose ang'akulongela, ‘Ulole, kakunyika!’ mleke kughenda, au ‘Kahano, mne chiheleto cha mghati,’ mleke kutoghola.
Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa ka lumwesa pfalumwemwesa mlanga mwose, kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsua mbaka ubali wa kwalikuswela litsua.
Hohose hane mtsogha, pfimanga watsetingana.

“Bahala ghamatsuwa agho gha ghamaghayo aghatsomala, litsua litsoghumighwa ichisi, na lwetsi ng'alutsolapfa bae ghumwanga, tsinondo tsisolaghala kulawa mlanga na tsingupfu itsili kulanga tsitsohighisighwa.
Chipindi acho, chitango che Imwana we Imunu chitsolawila mlanga na isi tsose tsitsolila, iwanu watsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mna ghamawingu mlanga, hamwe ne ingupfu na utunitso mkulu.
Naye katsowatuma wamalaika wake wane malati ilikemela sideke, nawo watsoweka hamwe awala iwasaghulighwe kulawa chila ubali we iisi, kulawa utsighilo uno we lilanga mbaka utsighilo ungi.
“Mwilangulitse imbuli ino kulawa mne mbiki ghwa mkuyu, ghamaputila ghake haghakuwa madeke na kwandusa kutsuka, mwomanya mvula tsahabehi.
Pfipfila, hamkona agha ghose mmanye chipindi cha habehi ghendo.
Nowalongelani ghendo, iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ng'awatsoluta bae mbaka agha ghose ghalawile,
lilanga ne isi pfitsoluta lekeni mbuli tsangu ng'atsitsoluta mbe.
“Kuduhu imunu iyomanya litsuwa wala isaa ayo, hata wamalaika wa kulanga, wala Imwana, ila Aba yaliyeka iyomanya.
Ka pfailawile mne ghamatsuwa gha Nuhu, itsakuwa pfipfo hayatsakutsa Imwana we Imunu.
Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa agho ng'ana ghamafuliko ghalawile, iwanu tsawang'ali wakuja na ukunwa, wokwela na kukwelighwa mbaka litsuwa lya Nuhu hengile mne safina.
Ng'awamanyile bae choni ching'alawile mbaka ghamafuliko ghatsa na kuwasola wose. Apfi pfipfo pfaitsolawila hayatsakutsa Imwana we Imunu.
Iwanu weli watsakuwa kumghunda, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
Iwapinga weli watsotwanga hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
“Apfo, mwalangitse, kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae litsuwa lyachi Imtwatsa wenu hayatsakutsa.
Lekeni mmanye apfi, ka mwenye kaye ang'amanyile imbapfi kakutsa tsuwachi, ang'akalile meso, na tsang'oileka bae ing'anda yake ibenighwe.
Pfipfila namwe mwiyandae, kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa mne isaa ng'amuilolele bae yatse.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Kuya yuhi imtumwa yotogholighwa na yane ihekima? Ayula imtwatsa wake yamwikile yawemile iwatumwa wangi mne ing'anda yake na kuweng'a ichijo chawo chipindi chinoghile.
Kabweda imtumwa yula imtwatsa wake hayatsakuya na kumpfika kotenda apfo,
Nowalongelani ghendo, imtwatsa ayo katsomwika kwimilitsa ipfinu pfake pfose.
Lekeni ka mtumwa keha, na ang'elongela imwenyegho, ‘Imtwatsa wangu katsokawa kuya,’
kuya kakwandusa ukuwatowa iwatumwa weyaghe na ukuja na ukunwa hamwe ne iwanu iwopatika.
Imtwatsa we imtumwa ayo katsakutsa mne litsuwa lyang'omlolela bae na mne isaa yang'aimanyile bae.
Imtwatsa ayo katsomghana pfihindi pfihindi na katsomwika hamwe ne iwang'enye, ako kutsakuwa na chililo na kughegheda ghamatsino.
